functional_units.name: Document Load Failure State Controller
functional_units.description: Publishes a load failure state for documents and surfaces it via SwiftUI banner with retry/dismiss controls.

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Banner for Document Load Failures
functional_units.description: Displays an observable banner in the UI when document loading fails, providing retry and dismiss options.

functional_units.name: Unit/UI Coverage Extension for Failure Handling
functional_units.description: Extends unit and UI test coverage to validate document load failure handling and banner behavior.
